insert into sy_union (union_name, union_channel, union_image, union_dis_image, union_type, union_hidden, union_free, union_sort, union_del, union_operation, banner_url, registable, union_desc, union_circle_level, union_banner, add_time, union_top_list_flag, union_introduction ) values (#{unionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionDisImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionHidden,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionFree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unionDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionOperation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionCircleLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionBanner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unionTopListFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{unionIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

union_id = #{record.unionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
union_name = #{record.unionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_channel = #{record.unionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_image = #{record.unionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_dis_image = #{record.unionDisImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_type = #{record.unionType,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update sy_union set union_name = #{unionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_channel = #{unionChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_image = #{unionImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_dis_image = #{unionDisImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_type = #{unionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_hidden = #{unionHidden,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_free = #{unionFree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_sort = #{unionSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, union_del = #{unionDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_operation = #{unionOperation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, banner_url = #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registable = #{registable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_desc = #{unionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, union_circle_level = #{unionCircleLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, union_banner = #{unionBanner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, union_top_list_flag = #{unionTopListFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where union_id = #{unionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT m.count - p.count FROM (SELECT COUNT(member_id) COUNT FROM sy_member) m, (SELECT COUNT(poor_id) COUNT FROM sy_poor) p

SELECT SUM(order_amount)/100 FROM sy_project_money_order pmo, sy_circle_member cm, sy_circle c WHERE pmo.buyer_id = cm.member_id AND cm.circle_id = c.circle_id AND c.code = #{_parameter} AND order_state = 40
SELECT SUM(order_amount)/100 FROM sy_bazaar_order bo, sy_circle_member cm, sy_circle c WHERE bo.buyer_id = cm.member_id AND cm.circle_id = c.circle_id AND c.code = #{_parameter} AND order_state = 40

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sy_order o, sy_circle_member cm, sy_circle c WHERE o.buyer_id = cm.member_id AND cm.circle_id = c.circle_id AND order_state IN (15,30, 40, 50) AND goods_project_type IN (17, 24) AND c.code = #{_parameter}

SELECT SUM(goods_num) FROM sy_order o, sy_order_goods og, sy_circle_member cm, sy_circle c WHERE og.order_id = o.order_id AND o.buyer_id = cm.member_id AND cm.circle_id = c.circle_id AND c.code = #{_parameter} AND o.order_state IN (15,30, 40, 50) AND o.goods_project_type IN (17, 24)
